text: Mauricio Enrique Candiani Galaz (born 24 November 1972) is a Mexican politician and businessman from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing the Federal District. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Mauricio Candiani
